items.text:
You got to know Kordo Haverson well enough during your training, but
this time the old former Ranger gives you a warm grin and clasps your
hand. “Welcome back, fellows! How’s your patrol been treating you?”

You realize that, with your training complete, Kordo sees you as fellow
Rangers and not novice students. Now you get a chance to see a side
of the veteran hunter that you’d never known before.

You get Kordo talking about some of his greatest hunts. He chuckles.
“Well, my greatest quarry is the one I haven’t caught ... yet. Up in the
... no, you know what, I’d better not talk about it. I don’t want to send
you on some hopeless chase.”
to ask him about this elusive quarry.
